about_the_game:
The Supporter pack decks out each wizard with golden garbs. If you love SpellRogue and want to support us further, buying this DLC will help fuel further development. And, it also comes with our eternal gratitude and thanks for your love and support of SpellRogue.

May your dice roll true!

Important note: By buying this DLC you are first and foremost showing your support for the game and for us, the developers. The bling-bling in the list above is really just icing on the cake!
